Frontend application with dynamic data fetching from backend APIs
Backend application connecting to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
Course browsing interface displaying available Python data science courses
Learning content delivery system for enrolled courses
Assignment submission interface for course assignments
Grade querying dashboard for users to view their learning grades
Database schema supporting users, courses, enrollments, assignments, and grades
Responsive UI design with honeydew background and dark olive green components
Package.json configuration with npm run install:all for frontend and backend installation
Package.json configuration with npm run dev for concurrent frontend and backend development servers
API endpoints for course management and retrieval
API endpoints for assignment submission and grade reporting
User dashboard for managing enrolled courses and tracking progress
